item.title: Hello World
item.description: Well, hello there. Welcome to this blog/portfolio. Some of the data crunching projects I have done will be collated here. Hope to keep this blog a mutually beneficial experience. For you, and for me. :) The full image comes from this wonderful cartoon by Grant Snider:
item.content:
Well, hello there.

Welcome to this blog/portfolio. Some of the data crunching projects I have done will be collated here. Hope to keep this blog a mutually beneficial experience. For you, and for me. :)

The full image comes from this wonderful cartoon by Grant Snider:
